text: Knema kinabaluensis is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is endemic to Borneo where it is confined to Sabah. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Knema kinabaluensis. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Knema kinabaluensis
